Space-Comm Expo Dubai

8 October 2025 – 9 October 2025

Hub Exhibitions Dubai, United Arab Emirates

WHERE SPACE DOES BUSINESS

Space-Comm Expo Dubai is a new event for a new era in global space industry collaboration to promote space exploration and using space technology to address global challenges.

Space is a global industry and Middle East is a global hub for business. Space-Comm Expo aims to bring together industry leaders and influencers from across government, business, defence and aerospace from the UAE, Europe, the Middle East and Africa.

The UAE has been at the forefront of emerging space nations with global strategic partnerships with NASA and ESA and other nations, sending probes to Mars, planning lunar rovers, and astronaut missions to the Moon.

Space-Comm Expo Dubai will connect emerging space nations with established space nations, alongside Primes, SMEs and Start-ups from the commercial sector to showcase the latest science and technology shaping the future of a new space age. The event builds on the success and award-winning format of the Space-Comm Expo Series featuring exhibitors, product demonstrations, keynote speakers, multiple conference theatres, roundtables and 1-2-1 networking opportunities.

WHY THE UAE?

THE UAE: A GROWING SPACE POWERHOUSE ASSEMBLING THE INTERNATIONAL SPACE INDUSTRY

PLUS

  • 3000+ engineers, technicians, and specialists
  • 80 entities and companies in the space industry
  • $3 billion spent commercially on space-related activities between 2015 and 2020
  • 40% increase on space services and applications contracts
  • 57 companies and space entities currently operating
  • In 2019, the UAE government announced a plan to invest $5.4 billion in the space sector, including establishing a spaceport and the development of a Mars Science City.
  • This thriving and dynamic region is the perfect international hub to bring an international space show.
  • The most important date in the UAE space industry calendar
  • The only event that covers the whole of the space supply chain
  • Discover new technologies, innovations and applications from over 150+ suppliers
  • Learn from keynotes and case studies
  • Hear influential international space industry and government speakers
  • Gain knowledge from world-leading authorities & technical experts
  • Source new products, services and suppliers with specialist expertise
  • Save time finding new suppliers with our 1-2-1 Meet the Buyer sessions
  • Meet the next generation of innovators and disruptors in the Start Up Zone
  • Join our invitation-only roundtables
  • Save time by meeting our phenomenal exhibitor line-up in one place
  • Over 30 hours of free-to-attend high level conference sessions
  • Three seminar theatres – Keynote, Defence in Space and Small-Sats

Impact Orbit Creative Group

Impact Orbit Creative Group is a multi-disciplinary consultancy and innovation hub focused on driving sustainable growth, digital transformation, and impact-led strategies in the space and technology sectors. We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to deliver strategic guidance, communications expertise, and frameworks for responsible innovation.
